website_summaries.verdict: Choose this chair if you're looking for an oversize model for your lawn, patio, or camping.
pros: A unique double-size model that accommodates up to 250 pounds
Neutral shade blends well with most decor
cons: Locking system doesn't seem very stable
On high end of price range

customer_reviews.title: Please don’t buy this!  Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Normally, SUNNYDAZE has good products, BUT: It’s very cheap plastic hardware, easily cracks and hella flimsy. The canvas part was actually pretty decent (ONLY reason it’s getting 2 stars). It’s not as oversized as advertised, essentially the same as a regular size. And worst of all, it’s so low to the ground, there’s absolutely no way it could ever be a “zero-gravity” chair. Sorry Amazon, you let me down with this product. Also, mine came broken
customer_reviews.author: JonBoy the Marine

customer_reviews.title: in addition the chairs are suppose to be oversized but they are just like the other chairs we currently have that are NOT
customer_reviews.text: contacted seller because the pillows do not fit over the back of the chair so inquired about what to do with no response. in addition the chairs are suppose to be oversized but they are just like the other chairs we currently have that are NOT oversized
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable and a great deal for the money
customer_reviews.text: On the upside, very comfortable and a great deal for the money. I ordered the blue and the color is just what you see in the pictures (I like it). On the downside, the locks that hold the recliner position in place don't truly lock in place - they're just a friction device that creeps if you're laying all the way back. Also one of the elastic cords started to fray outside of its black sheath only a few weeks after purchase, and I don't remember anything scraping it. It doesn't affect the chair, but seems awfully early for this to happen.
customer_reviews.author: Scott McCrory

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable chair, but locking wheels did not hold chair ...
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable chair, but locking wheels did not hold chair in desired reclining position. Chair slipped back to terminal reclined position. Needs a better locking system!
customer_reviews.author: Glenn from Glendale

customer_reviews.title: Superior customer service and product - Sunnydaze Outdoor XL Zero Gravity Lounge Chair
customer_reviews.text: The lounger chairs are WONDERFUL - the quality is great, the price reasonable, the shipping fast, the one snap on cup holder was replaced in 3 days. It was slightly damaged in shipping, but we were so excited about getting the chairs so fast, that my hubby opened the box and found the cup holder loose. I emailed customer service and received a new one in 3 days! The chairs are wonderful! They are very roomy, comfortable , and perfect for a nap in the sun! Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Florida Gramma

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.  Keep looking.
customer_reviews.text: I have had these chairs only a couple months, and the connection between the seat and frame is breaking off. Also, the fabric is warping.
customer_reviews.author: Damadefuerza

customer_reviews.title: SOOO comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and he loves it. It is so comfortable to lay in (not tat he lets me in it often). You can tighten it to where you like it if you do not want to lay all the way back. It is durable and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Lisam

customer_reviews.title: Awesome chairs
customer_reviews.text: I looooooove these chairs! Not a bad price either! They are so so comfy and I love the little cell phone and drink holder attached. friends/family who have sat in them all ask where I got them, how much, etc cuz they want em too!
customer_reviews.author: tatalin0608

customer_reviews.title: Solid chair with good locking mechanism
customer_reviews.text: I was slightly disappointed by the word "oversized", as I was replacing a true oversized Zero Gravity chair with this one. My bad - I should have read the dimensions. I like the extra width as the dog loves to jump up and sit and recline with us . Other than that, the chair is great. Nice, solid construction and the rolling locking mechanisms work better than the trigger-style on the chair I already had.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: So pleased with how sturdy these are, the color is beauti and i love the cup & phone holders, which are detachable. Great price. I may buy two more.
customer_reviews.author: A Virginia Citizen

customer_reviews.title: Ready for summer
customer_reviews.text: Just received these items. Comfortable, sturdy and no assembly required. The household is happy and ready for summer.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Curry

customer_reviews.title: Rusts after two days
customer_reviews.text: This chair is so comfortable, but it becomes very uncomfortable (emotionally) when your eyes see rust and the paint falling off after two days of use at the beach. And no salt touching it.
customer_reviews.author: James Russell

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs
customer_reviews.text: Love these product. Don’t know if this was the first I bought or if I bought more! Really good chairs
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Jo

customer_reviews.title: Not oversized
customer_reviews.text: This is not an oversized chair. It is narrow and not comfortable. I have several zero gravity chairs and this one does not hold its position and is not as described.
customer_reviews.author: Ursula Henry

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: received chairs and after 2 weeks of being outside in our screened in enclosure began to rust
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent chair
customer_reviews.text: Decent chair for the deck. My only complaints are that the position locks don't work that great, and the cup holder should be a bit deeper cuz everything will tip over.
customer_reviews.author: Beth W.

customer_reviews.title: Great for relaxation
customer_reviews.text: Nice for chilling out on the sun deck . Good color, lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: p.s.

customer_reviews.title: Nope!
customer_reviews.text: Rusted out after one summer. I do live at the beach so salt air perhaps didn’t help but I thought I would get more than one summer out of it. Bolts fell out too.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn M. Palumbo

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my parents! They absolutely LOVE them!
customer_reviews.author: Babbott

customer_reviews.title: Looks great...Well made!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable but really not an oversized chair...just a standard size. Need to correct this in the description. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: RUreading?

customer_reviews.title: Parts broke within 3-4 uses
customer_reviews.text: We have used these chairs only 3-4 times and one of the bolts sheared off just below the screw head! The chair is unusable. I am very disappointed as these are an expensive item and it is outside my return window. I would not recommend this product as it appears to be made of poor quality materials.
customer_reviews.author: VMR

customer_reviews.title: CHAIR BROKE
customer_reviews.text: BOUGHT TWO OF THESE CHAIRS LOOK GREAT. SECOND TIME SAT IN CHAIR IT BROKE. A PIECE OF METAL FLEW OFF THAT HELD THE ARM REST TO FRAME. WILL HAVE TO SEE IF I CAN GET SOME KIND OF SCREW TO FIX IT. THEY SAY YOU GET WHAT YOU PAY FOR. NOT HAPPY WITH THEM
customer_reviews.author: VL

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made.  Very Flimsy.  Not worth $85
customer_reviews.text: Very poorly made. I am 250 pounds feels very flimsy. Not made for bigger people
customer_reviews.author: troy bigley

customer_reviews.title: Really liked these chairs
customer_reviews.text: Really liked these chairs. One thing I dont care for is the "width" of the chairs.... for the money I thought they would be larger. Didnt read the dimensions....my bad!!
customer_reviews.author: Harmonydove

customer_reviews.title: Not zero gravity but nice chair
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made chair and certainly ergonomic. The one thing i don't like is that the chair is advertised as zero gravity. A true zero gravity would allow far enough recline to bring the legs over the heart, and this is not the case. Other than that, comfortable chair but not zero gravity.
customer_reviews.author: Marty K.

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Looked good when we got it, quickly the head pillow stretched out and chair began to mold. Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: For My Yard
customer_reviews.text: I Love the chars side tables not so much, One broke right away?
customer_reviews.author: Deana R. Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift for my parents and they love it. It was so comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my parents and they love it. It was so comfortable, they were sitting on it in the living room before they brought it to the backyard.
customer_reviews.author: J. Brownstein

customer_reviews.title: I bought two of these chairs and was very pleased with them
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these chairs and was very pleased with them. However, one of the chairs arrived with a crack in the arm. Through a series of emails back and forth with the seller I was able to get the problem resolved 100% to my satisfaction. My wife and I find these chairs to be extremely comfortable and light enough to easily move from one place to another.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Eagle

customer_reviews.title: VERY COMFORTABLE
customer_reviews.text: WE LOVE OUR CHAIRS. THEY ARE GREAT FOR NAPPING ON THE SCREEN PORCH.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly comfortable, Sturdy enough for a larger person or for a wiggling toddler. The detachable side tray is generous in size and durable enough for years of wear.
customer_reviews.author: Marie In Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Like them a lot, very comfy and like the multiple positions but a little awkward to position.
customer_reviews.author: Seren

customer_reviews.title: Comfort 1st
customer_reviews.text: Chair could be longer---could recline further back! Still is a great improvement from our previous ones.
customer_reviews.author: jane capellini

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Camping Chairs
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy sitting outside while camping. These chairs are very comfortable. The cup holder works great.
customer_reviews.author: OffBeatLeaf

customer_reviews.title: This is not OVERSIZED!
customer_reviews.text: There is no way this is oversized!! BEWARE if you are looking for oversized chair. Price is more than regular size chair and my old regular size chair is actually wider!
customer_reviews.author: D. St Pierre

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, nice looking and sturdy. They’re are good size and are little bit clunky for a 5’0 woman to carry around. It’s not a real problem but I can only carry one at a time. Definitely recommend these lovely, comfortable chairs; it’s so nice to recline and enjoy a nap or a book to read in.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret A. Rinehold

customer_reviews.title: RUST.  Already??  Why?
customer_reviews.text: I live in South Florida. Only a few months old and i have rust and fabric is changing color. If you live in the North and keep the chairs in your garage more than half the year; then you might be happy. If you plan to use your chairs then do not buy these chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher M. Coyne

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This product broke and dumped me on my head within a month of purchase
customer_reviews.author: bexx

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable chair. Locking mechanism doesn't work that well, chair moves upright sometimes at slightest movement.
customer_reviews.author: Yizzouse45

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Lounger
customer_reviews.text: Love the color, sturdy and comfy. I enjoy the oversize, but regular would have been adequate. These chairs are very well made and a perfect patio lounger.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs
customer_reviews.text: Liked that these are a little wider than others, and I love the side cup holder! So far, they’re holding up well. Great color - true to picture for the darker brown ones. For the price I’d order again in a heartbeat!!
customer_reviews.author: wlako

customer_reviews.title: Love this chair
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair. Easy to get in and out of! All the way back is like being in a hammock but it doesn't move which is great
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for us. we are senior citizens, comfortable and easy to relax in and the pillows are comfortable..
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Hommel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and durable (so far).. we bought these for our deck up at the lake and they've been great
customer_reviews.author: Sutton M.

customer_reviews.title: Great chair for relaxing.
customer_reviews.text: Nice comfortable chairs, pleased with the quality of materials and design so far. Time will tell if they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Mikcon

customer_reviews.title: Fine for sitting around the pool or campfire
customer_reviews.text: Fine for sitting around the pool or campfire....not comfortable for sitting long periods of time, at least not for my husband.
customer_reviews.author: Margie S.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Comfy to sit in on the patio. the drink holder is a separate piece and I haven't figured out a good way to store it yet - hence the -1 star.
customer_reviews.author: Mpls Liz

customer_reviews.title: There was nothing to put together except for the cup ...
customer_reviews.text: There was nothing to put together except for the cup holder. That is the only reason it did not get 5 stars because I could not figure out where to attach it to the chair. Should have come with instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Cari

customer_reviews.title: Chairs are wonderful. When we received them one of the are ...
customer_reviews.text: Chairs are wonderful. When we received them one of the are rest were cracked. The box looked as though the carrier had beaten it. But over all the chairs are so very comfy and well worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: MIchael

customer_reviews.title: Awesome price for a comfortable/sturdy chair.
customer_reviews.text: We looked at these type of chairs for awhile. Research indicated Sunnydaze was one of the better ones, at least in this price range. Bit the bullet and ordered 2. Wow these chairs are comfy and so well made compared to other brand we had tried out!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie A. Eaves

customer_reviews.title: Don't really like that the chair does not lay out flat
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mom. Don't really like that the chair does not lay out flat
customer_reviews.author: RedneckSweetie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great seats, pre-assembled so it goes right out into enjoyment.
customer_reviews.author: Carl McQueen

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Received it in a timely. Chair looks great! Love the tray. However the Pillows elastic strap is tore off on one side.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, very comfortable and steady (my husband is ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the chair as a gift for my husband and he loves it. Good quality, very comfortable and steady (my husband is a heavy man:).
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana

customer_reviews.title: They are very comfortable. I am 5'10" and they are plenty long ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had these for a month or so now. Put out on uncovered patio, sun, rain- they are holding up well. They are very comfortable. I am 5'10" and they are plenty long enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loves the lounge
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves the lounge. The only thing wrong with it, is he falls asleep.
customer_reviews.author: Rae A.

customer_reviews.title: Wish it reclined just a bit more
customer_reviews.text: Product appeared to be sturdy and the width was comfortable. Little disappointed with the degree of recline.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken rivets in a short time.
customer_reviews.text: One of the rivets has already broken. I can fix it myself to avoid return and re-ship issues, but it didn’t last long.
customer_reviews.author: harlan howard

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Chairs! A must have for lounging in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Chairs! A must have for lounging in the yard or the beach! Very sturdy! Nice rich color!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony S NJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these oversized chaise loungers. The tray on the side is a nice plus. Color is as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Ullom

customer_reviews.title: Good chair Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Good chair Very comfortable,easy fold Can't go wrong with price I paid
customer_reviews.author: monu

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product In Every Way!!
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT! VERY STURDY & Light! EASY TO BRING TO BEACH!!!
customer_reviews.author: suzy tuccillo

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and attractive zero gravity chairs
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful chairs! They arrive fully assembled and are super comfortable in both the upright AND reclined positions. These are the best zero gravity chairs I've ever purchased (not my first of this type). No issue trying to balance your weight. Perfect deck chairs.
customer_reviews.author: M. Herman

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality. Went to return and will be charged ...
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. Went to return and will be charged $28 in shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: My Husband received this as a gift and he loves it! Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Denae F.

customer_reviews.title: the cuality
customer_reviews.text: i dislike , i buy a set of 2 chair i only received 1 chair
customer_reviews.author: Carlos C.

customer_reviews.title: Not happy.
customer_reviews.text: Not oversized like I thought they would be. Cheaply made..
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Good Chair
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable lawn chair, didn't really like the side table, the recesses are not deep enough to be of much use, and I am not sure what the rectangular one is for. But, that is a small part of the package and I just threw it away. The chair itself is a good size and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The chairs are awesome and more than expected. We love them. Thanks for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Pattillo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to fold up!!  Yay!
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are perfect for all aspects of my life. They are large and comfortable and I love the cup and cell tray.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Come in various colors
customer_reviews.text: We found this chair extremely comfortable and easy to use. The side attachment was an excellent bonus
customer_reviews.author: Bob  B

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs ~ great color!
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are just beautiful! I already had a canvas Zero Gravity chair and it's canvas. These are a really nice quality material and I actually like them better than my canvas chair. The rainwater stands in my canvas chair and it drips through these chairs which make it dry quickly. I live in S. Florida, so they get rained on frequently. Love the cup holders, too. The green I ordered looks really pretty beside my pool.
customer_reviews.author: cherylny

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great loungers. I am 250 pounds and I find the chairs to be very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: jerry vollmer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but rust almost instantly
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy but they started rusting after a week outside. Kind of disappointing for outdoor chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Adam C Recchia

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this product. One chair was missing screws and bolts. Fell apart when I took it out of the package. The other chair was in good condition. Also, there was sticky residue on the arms of both chairs, could be where tape was once at?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this chair...so far!
customer_reviews.text: Great Chairs and worth the investment. Quick shipping as well. We bought 4 of them for our trailer and use them around the campfire.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband as one of his fathers day gifts. He Loves this chair. My husband is 6'2" and approx 200 lbs and fits well in the chair. The side drink caddy is nice and it has another small compartment for a phone or what not too, The color blue is vibrant like the pic and the stitching seems sturdy. The shipping took less than a week. We are very please with this chair and will be ordering another.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Pandolfino

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far this chair has met my expectations. We'll see how it holds up after some use.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Maguire

customer_reviews.title: Perfect take along
customer_reviews.text: We love our chairs! They are perfect my our pool or to pack up for the beach!
customer_reviews.author: James Dungan

customer_reviews.title: Answers to low ratings
customer_reviews.text: I received these chairs yesterday. They came fully assembled in one box. I plan to use the in my screened in porch so I probably won't have an issue with rust. They are lightweight and can be carried easily. The seat is not extra wide but since my husband lost weight he fits 286 down to 222. We had an extra wide chair, much heavier. The seats will fly back but if u turn the knob on side to add tension it is still very easy to push back. The cup holder is solid but will only hold a shallow glass or plastic cup (not very deep). Otherwise it is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Fusco

customer_reviews.title: Bought for a gift and my son loved them. They are wider than usual which makes ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a gift and my son loved them. They are wider than usual which makes them extra comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Smart Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The chairs were well constructed but had grease spots on fabric seats when they arrived (in box )
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Natarajan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these chairs, very comfy & the side tables are great too!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mari Weiss

customer_reviews.title: Relaxing!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased and used throughout the summer of 2016. Very durable construction and comfortable! I love that there are no handles or tricks to adjust level of recline, just use your own body weight--gravity will do the rest! The cup/phone holder is a nice touch, although I remove it when collapsing or storing. As for storage they fold like any other outdoor chair. These are used on an upstairs walkout balcony/porch, so I store one in each bedroom closet (small) with room to spare. Even though they are lightweight, they are bulky and save me from two flights of steps to the basement. Would definitely recommend and purchase for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amy in Wisconsin

customer_reviews.title: They are really comfortable! The three stars are for the fact that ...
customer_reviews.text: They are really comfortable! The three stars are for the fact that the one head pillow doesn't fit over the chair and we only received one cup holder tray attachment(supposed to come with each chair). They are very light and easy to fold. I would still order again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Box was damaged, one chair was cracked in arm. not worth the trouble to mail back and pay postage, disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Disapointed
customer_reviews.text: The arm screw was off the chair and rattling in the box. Put it back on the arm of the chair. It came loose again and now it is lost. The webbing had a cord dangling where someone did not pull it through the islet. Where is your Quality Control Sunnydaze?
customer_reviews.author: Gary T.

customer_reviews.title: Great nappers!
customer_reviews.text: We love zero gravity chairs. These are wide enough for me to put a little pillow on each side to support my arms as I read. Great chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Janis A. Patten

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: If dollar General store sold chairs, they'd have these cheap pieces of trash. Cheap is an understatement. RETURNED
customer_reviews.author: Malynda Richardson

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with only 1 chair... Clearly states set of two....
customer_reviews.author: Richard Rokicki

customer_reviews.title: Cup holder tray does not sit level, it will ...
customer_reviews.text: Cup holder tray does not sit level, it will only hold a cup that will fit in holder, just don't bump it. Nothing will just sit on the tray (slides right off). The chairs don't go back near as far as my other chairs, not near far enough
customer_reviews.author: booklover7

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Chairs came out of box with screws falling out, chairs falling apart, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Light

product_meta.title: Sunnydaze Outdoor XL Zero Gravity Lounge Chair with Pillow and Cup Holder, Folding Patio Lawn Recliner, Khaki
feature_bullets: ROOMY AND COMFORTABLE: Anti gravity beach lounger is 28 inches wide x 69 inches long x 34 inches deep x 42 inches tall; Each chair weighs 15 pounds; Seat height: 14.5 inches; Seat width: 22 inches; Arm height: 27 inches; Weight capacity: 250 pounds
DURABLE CONSTRUCTION: Collapsible chair is made of powder-coated steel tube framing and all-weather, fade-resistant Textilene sling seat and seat back material
COMES FULLY ASSEMBLED: Camping chair pack include 1 cup holder and 1 removable headrest pillow so you can easily relax wherever you go; Can be enjoyed on the deck, yard, porch, or by the pool

LOCKABLE SMOOTH RECLINE FUNCTION: Lock your position by using the knob located under the armrests; As this is a 0 gravity lounger, it allows you to stretch out into a comfortable reclined state without being completely flat
WARRANTY: Sunnydaze Decor backs its products with a 1-year manufacturer's warranty for worry-free purchasing

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars184 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
